explains: adj. 人道的，仁慈的；（学科分支）人文的，高尚的
wordGroup: humane society 人道协会；保护动物协会

sentences.en: In the mid-nineteenth century, Dorothea Dix began to campaign for humane treatment of the mentally ill.
sentences.cn: 在19世纪中叶，多罗西娅·迪克斯发起了为精神病患者争取人道待遇的运动。

sentences.en: Since 1975 advocates of humane treatment of animals have broadened their goals to oppose the use of animals for fur,leather, wool and food.
sentences.cn: 自1975年以来，人道对待动物的倡导者们将他们的目标扩大到反对用动物做毛皮、皮革、羊毛和食物。

sentences.en: There is a weapon called humane killer.
sentences.cn: 有一种工具叫做麻醉屠宰机。
